channel.title: Shotgun missing after Unforeseen Consequences
channel.description: I had a pistol and a shotgun up until I found an SMG. Once the SMG was equipped in slot 3, the shotgun disappeared from slot 4.Can't pick up a new one. Is this a bug or expected behavior?
